title: Keep ‚ÄúNo‚Äù button always visible, upgrade fireworks to live bursts, and replace finale video with uploaded image

requirements.text: Update Page 1 ‚ÄúNo‚Äù button behavior so the button remains visible at all times while it moves (no disappearing/reappearing), and it continues to relocate immediately on click.

quotes: The ‚ÄúNo‚Äù button should be visible at all times, and it should be moving around and not disappearing and showing up.

acceptanceCriteria: On Page 1, the ‚ÄúNo‚Äù button is continuously visible while moving; it does not flicker, hide, unmount/remount, or jump via disappearance/reappearance.
The ‚ÄúNo‚Äù button stays within the visible container/viewport bounds (does not move off-screen).
Clicking/tapping the ‚ÄúNo‚Äù button immediately moves it to a new random position (in addition to its continuous movement).

requirements.text: Replace the current fireworks background implementation (static overlay pulse) with a live fireworks bursting animation for Page 2 (Celebration) and Page 3 (Finale).

quotes: The animation of fireworks should be live fireworks bursting.

acceptanceCriteria: On Page 2 and Page 3, fireworks visually appear as repeated bursts/explosions over time (not a static image overlay with opacity/scale changes).
The fireworks animation runs continuously without user interaction and does not block clicks on foreground content.
Performance remains acceptable on typical laptops/phones (no severe stutter or freezing during the 5-second celebration and on the finale page).

requirements.text: Change Page 3 (Finale) to display the user-uploaded image IMG_6912.jpeg instead of a video, keeping the caption text ‚ÄúThis could be usü§≠‚Äù and the Valentine/fireworks styling.

quotes: And add this image in the last page instead of the video.

acceptanceCriteria: Page 3 renders an image (not a video) centered in the existing finale card/layout, with the caption ‚ÄúThis could be usü§≠‚Äù displayed below it.
The image source uses the uploaded file name "IMG_6912.jpeg" as the displayed asset.
If the image cannot be loaded (missing file path), show a non-blocking fallback UI message indicating the image will appear once uploaded, without breaking the page layout.
Fireworks remain visible/animated in the background on Page 3.

requirements.text: Update project documentation to reflect that Page 3 uses an image instead of a video, including the expected filename and where it should be placed under frontend/public.
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/README.md no longer instructs users to upload a finale video file; it instead documents using the finale image.
README explicitly documents the expected filename (IMG_6912.jpeg) and the target directory path under frontend/public where it must be placed so the app can load it.

constraints: Frontend immutable paths must not be edited: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui/*.
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo; do not add additional backend services.
Do not introduce third-party real-time services or external databases.
nonGoals: Adding new pages or changing the 3-page navigation flow.
Adding user accounts/authentication changes (Internet Identity behavior remains as-is).
Adding backend storage or persistence for images/videos.
